Mike Pence decision "major coup" for RGA- David Catanese: Mike Pence decision "major coup" for RGA Indiana Rep. Mike Pence isn't running for president, which means a gubernatorial run is almost inevitable. Mike Pence won't formally announce his gubernatorial campaign on Thursday-a state law prohibits announced candidates from raising money during the state legislative session, scheduled to end April-but he fully intends to run for governor, a source with knowledge of his thinking told POLITICO. Mike Pence was Perry's first recruitment call after he became chairman, a source with knowledge of the call told POLITICO, and Mike Pence met in Washington on Wednesday with Virginia Gov. WINDSOR, Ontario( AP)-- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.
